original: 是夜，一夥黑衣人潛入，於飲水和乾糧中投毒，導致全軍病倒者十之八九。巡邏士卒事後捉捕到一名犯人，竟是那日於道旁求醫者。
text: It was the night when a group of men in black sneaked in and poisoned drinking water and dry food, causing nine out of ten people in the army to fall ill. The patrolman arrested a prisoner afterwards, who was seeking medical attention on the road that day.
